title: Bug 104630: Column icons not visible when connecting to a Derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons are not displayed in the application.
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons are missing in the application.
EB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons should be visible in the application.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a new project.
2. Create a new report.
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database.
   - Set the Driver Class to 'com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver'.
   - Set the Database URL to 'jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui'.
   - Set the User Name to 'root'.
   - Set the Password to 'root'.
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset.
5. In the 'Edit Data Set' window, select 'Query'.
6.
